elements.title: Procedure

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Consent
columns: Achieved with difficulty / borderline/marginal or needs attention

rows.text: Ensures that consent has been obtained and follows time-out procedures

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Pre-procedural preparation
columns: Achieved with difficulty / borderline/marginal or needs attention

rows.text: Ensures proper and safe positioning of the patient on the operating table
Demonstrates careful aseptic technique with little risk of compromising sterility
Ensures all relevant information regarding diagnosis is available and reviewed to allow appropriate operative decision making (history and investigations)

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Exposure and closure
columns: Achieved with difficulty / borderline/marginal or needs attention

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Intra Operative Technique
columns: Achieved with difficulty / borderline/marginal or needs attention

rows.text: Appropriate and safe use of instruments
Consistently handles tissue well with minimal damage
Knots and sutures demonstrate a sound technique
Demonstrates anatomy and tissue planes well
Proceeds at appropriate pace with economy of movement
Follows a logical sequence of operative steps for the procedure
Anticipates and responds appropriately to variation
Deals calmly and effectively with untoward events/complications
Uses assistant(s) to the best advantage at all times
Communicates with scrub nurse and other members of surgical team clearly and professionally

elements.name: Outcome_Question
elements.title: GLOBAL SUMMARY
elements.description: based on the observed relevant parts of this procedure only

choices.text: Level 0 Insufficient evidence observed to support judgement
Level 1 Unable to perform entire procedure under supervision
Level 2 Able to perform procedure under supervision
Level 3 Does not usually require supervision but may need help occasionally
Level 4 Competent to perform the procedure unsupervised (can deal with complications)
